mapper.select: select id, name, use_count from options join trims_options on options.id = trims_options.option_id where trim_id = #{id} order by use_count desc limit 3
select id, name, description, price from trims

select id, name, color_code, choice_ratio, price from external_color join trims_external_color on external_color.id = trims_external_color.external_color_id where trim_id = #{id} order by choice_ratio desc

select id, name, fabric_image, internal_image, price, choice_ratio from internal_color join trims_internal_color on internal_color.id = trims_internal_color.internal_color_id where trim_id = #{id} order by choice_ratio desc, name desc

select package_price + option_price + internal_color_price + external_color_price from (select trims.id, sum(trims_package.price) as package_price from trims join trims_package on trims.id = trims_package.trim_id where trims.id = #{id}) as package natural join (select trims.id, sum(trims_options.price) as option_price from trims join trims_options on trims.id = trims_options.trim_id where trims.id = #{id}) as options natural join (select trims.id, max(trims_internal_color.price) as internal_color_price from trims join trims_internal_color on trims.id = trims_internal_color.trim_id where trims.id = #{id}) as internal_color natural join (select trims.id, max(trims_external_color.price) as external_color_price from trims join trims_external_color on trims.id = trims_external_color.trim_id where trims.id = #{id}) as external_color;
